word.kjv: My servant Moses is not so, who is faithful in all mine house.
word.thailand: สำหรับโมเสสผู้รับใช้ของเราก็ไม่เป็นเช่นนั้น ในวงศ์วานทั้งหมดของเราเขาสัตย์ซื้อ
word.spanish1909: No así á mi siervo Moisés, que es fiel en toda mi casa:
word.latinvulgate: At non talis servus meus Moyses, qui in omni domo mea fidelissimus est :
word.italian1927: Non così coi mio servitore Mosè, che è fedele in tutta la mia casa.
word.german1912: Aber nicht also mein Knecht Mose, der in meinem ganzen Hause treu ist.
word.french1910: Il n'en est pas ainsi de mon serviteur Moïse. Il est fidèle dans toute ma maison.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 可是，對我的僕人摩西卻不是這樣，他是在我全家忠心的。
word.korean: 내 종 모세와는 그렇지 아니하니 그는 나의 온 집에 충성됨이라
word.tagalog: Ang aking lingkod na si Moises ay hindi gayon; siya'y tapat sa aking buong buhay:
word.maori: Ehara taku pononga, a Mohi i te pera; he pono ia i toku whare katoa:
word.cebuano: Si Moises nga akong alagad dili sama niini; siya matinumanon sa tibook ko nga balay:
word.hebrew: ז לא כן עבדי משה  בכל ביתי נאמן הוא
word.hebrewmodern: לא כן עבדי משה בכל ביתי נאמן הוא׃

word.kjv: Know therefore that the LORD thy God, he is God, the faithful God, which keepeth covenant and mercy with them that love him and keep his commandments to a thousand generations;
word.thailand: เหตุฉะนี้พึงทราบเถิดว่า พระเยโฮวาห์พระเจ้าของพวกท่านเป็นพระเจ้า เป็นพระเจ้าสัตย์ซื่อ ผู้ทรงรักษาพันธสัญญาและความเมตตาต่อบรรดาผู้ที่รักพระองค์และรักษาพระบัญญัติของพระองค์ถึงพันชั่วอายุคน
word.spanish1909: Conoce, pues, que Jehová tu Dios es Dios, Dios fiel, que guarda el pacto y la misericordia á los que le aman y guardan sus mandamientos, hasta las mil generaciones;
word.latinvulgate: Et scies, quia Dominus Deus tuus, ipse est Deus fortis et fidelis, custodiens pactum et misericordiam diligentibus se, et his qui custodiunt præcepta ejus in mille generationes :
word.italian1927: Riconosci dunque che l’Eterno, l’Iddio tuo, è Dio: l’Iddio fedele, che mantiene il suo patto e la sua benignità fino alla millesima generazione a quelli che l’amano e osservano i suoi comandamenti,
word.german1912: So sollst du nun wissen, daß der HERR, dein Gott, ein Gott ist, ein treuer Gott, der den Bund und die Barmherzigkeit hält denen, die ihn lieben und seine Gebote halten, in tausend Glieder,
word.french1910: Sache donc que c'est l'Eternel, ton Dieu, qui est Dieu. Ce Dieu fidèle garde son alliance et sa miséricorde jusqu'à la millième génération envers ceux qui l'aiment et qui observent ses commandements.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 所以你要知道耶和華你的　神，他是　神，是信實可靠的　神；他向愛他和守他誡命的人，守約並且施慈愛，直到千代。
word.korean: 그런즉 너는 알라 ! 오직 네 하나님 여호와는 하나님이시요 신실하신 하나님이시라 그를 사랑하고 그 계명을 지키는 자에게는 천대까지 그 언약을 이행하시며 인애를 베푸시되
word.tagalog: Talastasin mo nga, na ang Panginoon ninyong Dios, ay siyang Dios: ang tapat na Dios, na nag-iingat ng tipan at naggagawad ng kagandahang-loob sa mga umiibig sa kaniya, at tumutupad ng kaniyang mga utos, hanggang sa isang libong salin ng lahi;
word.maori: Na kia mohio koe ki a Ihowa, ki tou Atua, ko te Atua ia, ko te Atua pono, e pupuri ana i te kawenata, i te atawhai mo te hunga e aroha ana ki a ia, e pupuri ana i ana whakahau a mano noa nga whakatupuranga;
word.cebuano: Busa hibaloi, nga si Jehova nga imong Dios, siya mao ang Dios, ang Dios nga matinumanon, nga nagabantay sa tugon ug sa mahigugmaong-kalolot alang niadtong mga nahagugma kaniya ug nagabantay sa iyang mga sugo ngadto sa usa ka libo kaliwatan,
word.hebrew: ט וידעת כי יהוה אלהיך הוא האלהים  האל הנאמן--שמר הברית והחסד לאהביו ולשמרי מצותו לאלף דור
word.hebrewmodern: וידעת כי יהוה אלהיך הוא האלהים האל הנאמן שמר הברית והחסד לאהביו ולשמרי מצותו לאלף דור׃

word.kjv: And he said, I will hide my face from them, I will see what their end shall be: for they are a very froward generation, children in whom is no faith.
word.thailand: และพระองค์ตรัสว่า `เราจะซ่อนหน้าของเราเสียจากเขา เราจะคอยดูว่าปลายทางของเขาจะเป็นอย่างไร เพราะเขาเป็นยุคที่ดื้อรั้น เป็นลูกเต้าที่ไม่มีความเชื่อ
word.spanish1909: Y dijo: Esconderé de ellos mi rostro, Veré cuál será su postrimería: Que son generación de perversidades, Hijos sin fe.
word.latinvulgate: Et ait : Abscondam faciem meam ab eis, et considerabo novissima eorum : generatio enim perversa est, et infideles filii.
word.italian1927: e ha detto: "Io nasconderò loro la mia faccia, e starò a vedere quale ne sarà la fine; poiché sono una razza quanto mai perversa, figliuoli in cui non è fedeltà di sorta.
word.german1912: und er sprach: Ich will mein Antlitz vor ihnen verbergen, will sehen, was ihnen zuletzt widerfahren wird; denn es ist eine verkehrte Art, es sind untreue Kinder.
word.french1910: Il a dit: Je leur cacherai ma face, Je verrai quelle sera leur fin; Car c'est une race perverse, Ce sont des enfants infidèles.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 說：‘我必掩面不顧他們，要看看他們的結局怎樣；因為他們是乖曲的一代，心裡沒有信實的人。
word.korean: 여호와의 말씀에 내가 내 얼굴을 숨겨 그들에게 보이지 않게 하고 그들의 종말의 어떠함을 보리니 그들은 심히 패역한 종류요 무신한 자녀임이로다
word.tagalog: At kaniyang sinabi, Aking ikukubli ang aking mukha sa kanila, Aking titingnan kung anong mangyayari sa kanilang wakas; Sapagka't sila'y isang napakasamang lahi, Na mga anak na walang pagtatapat.
word.maori: Na ka mea, Ka huna ahau i toku mata i a ratou, ka titiro atu ahau he aha he mutunga mo ratou: he whakatupuranga parori ke hoki ratou, he tamariki kahore he pono i roto.
word.cebuano: Ug miingon siya: Pagatagoon ko gikan kanila ang akong nawong, Pagatan-awon ko kong unsa ang ilang kaulahian: Kay sila maoy kaliwatan nga masukihon kaayo, Mga anak nga walay pagkamatinumanon.
word.hebrew: כ ויאמר אסתירה פני מהם--  {ר} אראה מה אחריתם  {ס}  כי דור תהפכת המה  {ר} בנים לא אמן בם  {ס}
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר אסתירה פני מהם אראה מה אחריתם כי דור תהפכת המה בנים לא אמן בם׃

word.greekot: καὶ εἶπεν ἀποστρέψω τὸ πρόσωπόν μου ἀπ' αὐτῶν καὶ δείξω τί ἔσται αὐτοῖς ἐπ' ἐσχάτων ὅτι γενεὰ ἐξεστραμμένη ἐστίν υἱοί οἷς οὐκ ἔστιν πίστις ἐν αὐτοῖς

word.kjv: And I will raise me up a faithful priest, that shall do according to that which is in mine heart and in my mind: and I will build him a sure house; and he shall walk before mine anointed for ever.
word.thailand: และเราจะให้ปุโรหิตผู้สัตย์ซื่อของเราเกิดขึ้นมา ซึ่งจะกระทำตามสิ่งที่มีอยู่ในจิตในใจของเรา และเราจะสร้างวงศ์วานมั่นคงให้เขา และเขาจะดำเนินอยู่ต่อหน้าผู้ที่เราเจิมไว้เป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: Y yo me suscitaré un sacerdote fiel, que haga conforme á mi corazón y á mi alma; y yo le edificaré casa firme, y andará delante de mi ungido todo los días.
word.latinvulgate: Et suscitabo mihi sacerdotem fidelem, qui juxta cor meum et animam meam faciet : et ædificabo ei domum fidelem, et ambulabit coram Christo meo cunctis diebus.
word.italian1927: Io mi susciterò un sacerdote fedele, che agirà secondo il mio cuore e secondo l’anima mia; io gli edificherò una casa stabile, ed egli sarà al servizio del mio unto per sempre.
word.german1912: Ich will aber einen treuen Priester erwecken, der soll tun, wie es meinem Herzen und meiner Seele gefällt; dem will ich ein beständiges Haus bauen, daß er vor meinem Gesalbten wandle immerdar.
word.french1910: Je m'établirai un sacrificateur fidèle, qui agira selon mon coeur et selon mon âme; je lui bâtirai une maison stable, et il marchera toujours devant mon oint.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我要為自己興起一位忠心的祭司，他必依照我的心意行事；我要為他建立一個穩固的家，他一生必行在我的受膏者面前。
word.korean: 내가 나를 위하여 충실한 제사장을 일으키리니 그 사람은 내 마음 내 뜻대로 행할 것이라 내가 그를 위하여 견고한 집을 세우리니 그가 나의 기름 부음을 받은 자 앞에서 영구히 행하리라
word.tagalog: At ako'y magbabangon para sa akin ng isang tapat na saserdote, na gagawa ng ayon sa nasa aking puso at nasa aking pagiisip: at ipagtatayo ko siya ng panatag na sangbahayan; at siya'y lalakad sa harap ng aking pinahiran ng langis, magpakailan man.
word.maori: A ka whakaarahia ake e ahau he tohunga pono maku, hei mahi i ta toku ngakau, i ta toku hinengaro i pai ai, maku ano e hanga he whare pumau mona; a ka haereere ia i nga ra katoa i te aroaro o taku e whakawahi ai.
word.cebuano: Ug ako magapatindog alang kanako ug usa ka matinumanong sacerdote, nga magabuhat sumala niadtong ania sa akong kasingkasing ug sa akong hunahuna: ug ako magatukod alang kaniya sa usa ka malig-on nga balay; ug siya magalakat sa atubangan sa akong dinihog sa walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: לה והקימתי לי כהן נאמן כאשר בלבבי ובנפשי יעשה ובניתי לו בית נאמן והתהלך לפני משיחי כל הימים
word.hebrewmodern: והקימתי לי כהן נאמן כאשר בלבבי ובנפשי יעשה ובניתי לו בית נאמן והתהלך לפני משיחי כל הימים׃

word.greekot: καὶ ἀναστήσω ἐμαυτῷ ἱερέα πιστόν ὃς πάντα τὰ ἐν τῇ καρδίᾳ μου καὶ τὰ ἐν τῇ ψυχῇ μου ποιήσει καὶ οἰκοδομήσω αὐτῷ οἶκον πιστόν καὶ διελεύσεται ἐνώπιον χριστοῦ μου πάσας τὰς ἡμέρας

word.kjv: Then Ahimelech answered the king, and said, And who is so faithful among all thy servants as David, which is the king's son in law, and goeth at thy bidding, and is honourable in thine house?
word.thailand: และอาหิเมเลคทูลตอบกษัตริย์ว่า "ในบรรดาข้าราชการผู้รับใช้ของพระองค์ มีผู้ใดเล่าที่จะสัตย์ซื่ออย่างดาวิด พระราชบุตรเขยของกษัตริย์ ผู้บังคับบัญชาทหารราชองครักษ์ และเป็นผู้มีเกียรติในพระราชสำนักของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Entonces Ahimelech respondió al rey, y dijo: ¿Y quién entre todos tus siervos es tan fiel como David, yerno además del rey, y que va por tu mandado, y es ilustre en tu casa?
word.latinvulgate: Respondensque Achimelech regi, ait : Et quis in omnibus servis tuis, sicut David fidelis, et gener regis, et pergens ad imperium tuum, et gloriosus in domo tua ?
word.italian1927: Allora Ahimelec rispose al re, dicendo: "E chi v’è dunque, fra tutti i tuoi servi, fedele come Davide, genero del re, pronto al tuo comando e onorato nella tua casa?
word.german1912: Ahimelech antwortete dem König und sprach: Und wer ist unter allen deinen Knechten wie David, der getreu ist und des Königs Eidam und geht in deinem Gehorsam und ist herrlich gehalten in deinem Hause?
word.french1910: Achimélec répondit au roi: Lequel d'entre tous tes serviteurs peut être comparé au fidèle David, gendre du roi, dévoué à ses ordres, et honoré dans ta maison?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 亞希米勒回答王說：“在你所有的臣僕中，有誰像大衛那樣忠心呢？他是王的女婿，又是你的衛隊的隊長，並且在你朝中是受敬重的。
word.korean: 아히멜렉이 왕에게 대답하여 가로되 `왕의 모든 신하 중에 다윗 같이 충실한 자가 누구인지요 그는 왕의 사위도 되고 왕의 모신도 되고 왕실에서 존귀한 자가 아니니이까 ?
word.tagalog: Nang magkagayo'y sumagot si Ahimelech sa hari, at nagsabi, At sino sa gitna ng lahat ng iyong mga lingkod ang tapat na gaya ni David, na manugang ng hari, at tinatanggap sa iyong pulong, at karangaldangal sa iyong bahay?
word.maori: Na ka utu a Ahimereke ki te kingi, ka mea, Ha, ko wai o au tangata katoa hei rite mo Rawiri te pono? ko te hunaonga hoki ia a te kingi, e haere ana i tau ngare, e whakahonoretia ana hoki i roto i tou whare?
word.cebuano: Unya si Ahimelech mitubag sa hari, ug miingon: Ug kinsa sa tanan mong mga sulogoon nga matinumanon ingon kang David, umagad nga lalake sa hari, ug gidawat ngadto sa imong pundok sa magtatambag ug tinahud sa imong balay?
word.hebrew: יד ויען אחימלך את המלך ויאמר  ומי בכל עבדיך כדוד נאמן וחתן המלך וסר אל משמעתך ונכבד בביתך

word.greekot: καὶ ἀπεκρίθη τῷ βασιλεῖ καὶ εἶπεν καὶ τίς ἐν πᾶσιν τοῖς δούλοις σου ὡς δαυιδ πιστὸς καὶ γαμβρὸς τοῦ βασιλέως καὶ ἄρχων παντὸς παραγγέλματός σου καὶ ἔνδοξος ἐν τῷ οἴκῳ σου

word.kjv: The LORD render to every man his righteousness and his faithfulness: for the LORD delivered thee into my hand to day, but I would not stretch forth mine hand against the LORD's anointed.
word.thailand: พระเยโฮวาห์ทรงประทานรางวัลแก่ทุกคนตามความชอบธรรมและความสัตย์ซื่อของเขา เพราะในวันนี้พระเยโฮวาห์ทรงมอบพระองค์ไว้ในมือของข้าพระองค์แล้ว แต่ข้าพระองค์มิได้เหยียดมือออกต่อสู้ผู้ที่พระเยโฮวาห์ทรงเจิมไว้
word.spanish1909: Y Jehová pague á cada uno su justicia y su lealtad: que Jehová te había entregado hoy en mi mano, mas yo no quise extender mi mano sobre el ungido de Jehová.
word.latinvulgate: Dominus autem retribuet unicuique secundum justitiam suam et fidem : tradidit enim te Dominus hodie in manum meam, et nolui extendere manum meam in christum Domini.
word.italian1927: L’Eterno retribuirà ciascuno secondo la sua giustizia e la sua fedeltà; giacché l’Eterno t’avea dato oggi nelle mie mani, e io non ho voluto metter le mani addosso all’unto dell’Eterno.
word.german1912: Der HERR aber wird einem jeglichen vergelten nach seiner Gerechtigkeit und seinem Glauben. Denn der HERR hat dich heute in meine Hand gegeben; aber ich wollte meine Hand nicht an den Gesalbten des HERRN legen.
word.french1910: L'Eternel rendra à chacun selon sa justice et sa fidélité; car l'Eternel t'avait livré aujourd'hui entre mes mains, et je n'ai pas voulu porter la main sur l'oint de l'Eternel.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華必按著各人的公義和信實報答他；今天耶和華把你交在我手裡，我卻不願伸手傷害耶和華的受膏者。
word.korean: 여호와께서 각 사람에게 그 의와 신실을 갚으시리니 이는 여호와께서 오늘날 왕을 내 손에 붙이셨으되 나는 손을 들어 여호와의 기름 부음을 받은 자 치기를 원치 아니하였음이니이다
word.tagalog: At gagantihin ng Panginoon ang bawa't tao sa kaniyang katuwiran at sa kaniyang pagtatapat: sapagka't ibinigay ka ng Panginoon sa aking kamay ngayon, at hindi ko iniunat ang aking kamay laban sa pinahiran ng langis ng Panginoon.
word.maori: A ma Ihowa e hoatu ki ia tangata, ki ia tangata tona tika me tona pono: kua homai nei hoki koe e Ihowa i tenei ra ki toku ringa, a kihai ahau i pai kia totoro toku ringa ki ta Ihowa i whakawahi ai.
word.cebuano: Ug si Jehova magahatag sa tagsatagsa ka tawo sa iyang pagkamatarung ug sa iyang pagkamatinumanon; kay ingon nga si Jehova nagtugyan kanimo sa akong kamot niining adlawa, ug ako dili mobakyaw sa akong kamot batok sa dinihog ni Jehova.
word.hebrew: כג ויהוה ישיב לאיש את צדקתו ואת אמנתו--אשר נתנך יהוה היום ביד ולא אביתי לשלח ידי במשיח יהוה
word.hebrewmodern: ויהוה ישיב לאיש את צדקתו ואת אמנתו אשר נתנך יהוה היום ביד ולא אביתי לשלח ידי במשיח יהוה׃

word.greekot: καὶ κύριος ἐπιστρέψει ἑκάστῳ τὰς δικαιοσύνας αὐτοῦ καὶ τὴν πίστιν αὐτοῦ ὡς παρέδωκέν σε κύριος σήμερον εἰς χεῖράς μου καὶ οὐκ ἠθέλησα ἐπενεγκεῖν χεῖρά μου ἐπὶ χριστὸν κυρίου

word.kjv: I am one of them that are peaceable and faithful in Israel: thou seekest to destroy a city and a mother in Israel: why wilt thou swallow up the inheritance of the LORD?
word.thailand: ฉันเป็นคนหนึ่งที่รักสงบและสัตย์ซื่อในอิสราเอล ท่านหาช่องที่จะทำลายเมือง อันเป็นเมืองแม่ในอิสราเอล ทำไมท่านจึงจะกลืนมรดกของพระเยโฮวาห์เสีย"
word.spanish1909: Yo soy de las pacíficas y fieles de Israel: y tú procuras destruir una ciudad que es madre de Israel: ¿por qué destruyes la heredad de Jehová?

word.kjv: And foundest his heart faithful before thee, and madest a covenant with him to give the land of the Canaanites, the Hittites, the Amorites, and the Perizzites, and the Jebusites, and the Girgashites, to give it, I say, to his seed, and hast performed thy words; for thou art righteous:
word.thailand: และพระองค์ทรงเห็นว่าน้ำใจของท่านสัตย์ซื่อต่อพระพักตร์พระองค์ และพระองค์ได้ทรงกระทำพันธสัญญากับท่าน ที่จะประทานแผ่นดินของคนคานาอัน คนฮิตไทต์ คนอาโมไรต์ คนเปริสซี คนเยบุส และคนเกอร์กาชีให้แก่เชื้อสายของท่าน และพระองค์ทรงกระทำให้คำตรัสของพระองค์สำเร็จ เพราะพระองค์ชอบธรรม
word.spanish1909: Y hallaste fiel su corazón delante de ti, é hiciste con él alianza para darle la tierra del Cananeo, del Hetheo, y del Amorreheo, y del Pherezeo, y del Jebuseo, y del Gergeseo, para darla á su simiente: y cumpliste tu palabra, porque eres justo.
word.latinvulgate: et invenisti cor ejus fidele coram te, et percussisti cum eo fœdus ut dares ei terram Chananæi, Hethæi, et Amorrhæi, et Pherezæi, et Jebusæi, et Gergesæi, ut dares semini ejus : et implesti verba tua, quoniam justus es.
word.italian1927: tu trovasti il cuor suo fedele davanti a te, e fermasti con lui un patto, promettendogli di dare alla sua progenie il paese de’ Cananei, degli Hittei, degli Amorei, de’ Ferezei, de’ Gebusei e de’ Ghirgasei; tu hai mantenuta la tua parola, perché sei giusto.
word.german1912: und sein Herz treu vor dir gefunden und einen Bund mit ihm gemacht, seinem Samen zu geben das Land der Kanaaniter, Hethiter, Amoriter, Pheresiter, Jebusiter und Girgasiter; und hast dein Wort gehalten, denn du bist gerecht. {~}
word.french1910: Tu trouvas son coeur fidèle devant toi, tu fis alliance avec lui, et tu promis de donner à sa postérité le pays des Cananéens, des Héthiens, des Amoréens, des Phéréziens, des Jébusiens et des Guirgasiens. Et tu as tenu ta parole, car tu es juste.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你見他在你面前心裡誠實可靠，就與他立約，要把迦南人、赫人、亞摩利人、比利洗人、耶布斯人和革迦撒人之地，賜給他的後裔；你履行了你的諾言，因為你是公義的。
word.korean: 그 마음이 주 앞에서 충성됨을 보시고 더불어 언약을 세우사 가나안 족속과, 헷 족속과, 아모리 족속과, 브리스 족속과, 여부스 족속과, 기르가스 족속의 땅을 그 씨에게 주리라 하시더니 그 말씀대로 이루셨사오니 주는 의로우심이로소이다
word.tagalog: At nasumpungan mo ang kaniyang puso na tapat sa harap mo, at nakipagtipan ka sa kaniya, upang ibigay ang lupain ng Cananeo, ng Hetheo, at ng Amorrheo, at ng Pherezeo, at ng Jebuseo, at ng Gergeseo, upang ibigay sa kaniyang binhi, at tumupad ng iyong mga salita; sapagka't ikaw ay matuwid.
word.maori: I kitea hoki e koe he ngakau pono tona ki tou aroaro, na whakaritea ana e koe he kawenata ki a ia, he mea kia homai te whenua o nga Kanaani, o nga Hiti, o nga Amori, o nga Perihi, o nga Iepuhi, o nga Kirikahi, kia homai ki ona uri, Na kua mana ne i i a koe au kupu; he tika hoki koe.
word.cebuano: Ug nakakaplag sa iyang kasingkasing nga matinumanon sa imong atubangan, ug naghimo ug usa ka tugon uban kaniya sa paghatag sa yuta sa Canaanhon, sa Hetehanon sa Amorehanon, ug sa Perezehanon, ug sa Jebusehanon, ug sa Gergesehanon, sa paghatag niini sa iyang kaliwat, ug natuman ang imong mga pulong; kay ikaw matarung.
word.hebrew: ח ומצאת את לבבו נאמן לפניך וכרות עמו הברית לתת את ארץ הכנעני החתי האמרי והפרזי והיבוסי והגרגשי לתת לזרעו ותקם את דבריך כי צדיק אתה
word.hebrewmodern: ומצאת את לבבו נאמן לפניך וכרות עמו הברית לתת את ארץ הכנעני החתי האמרי והפרזי והיבוסי והגרגשי לתת לזרעו ותקם את דבריך כי צדיק אתה׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version

word.kjv: And I made treasurers over the treasuries, Shelemiah the priest, and Zadok the scribe, and of the Levites, Pedaiah: and next to them was Hanan the son of Zaccur, the son of Mattaniah: for they were counted faithful, and their office was to distribute unto their brethren.
word.thailand: ข้าพเจ้าได้แต่งตั้งคนให้ดูแลเรือนพัสดุคือ เชเลมิยาห์ปุโรหิต ศาโดกธรรมาจารย์ และเปดายาห์แห่งคนเลวี และผู้ช่วยของเขาคือ ฮานันบุตรชายศักเกอร์ ผู้เป็นบุตรชายมัทธานิยาห์ เพราะนับได้ว่าเขาสัตย์ซื่อ และหน้าที่ของเขาคือแจกจ่ายแก่พวกพี่น้อง
word.spanish1909: Y puse por sobrestantes de ellos á Selemías sacerdote, y á Sadoc escriba, y de los Levitas, á Pedaías; y á mano de ellos Hanán hijo de Zaccur, hijo de Mathanías: pues que eran tenidos por fieles, y de ellos eran el repartir á sus hermanos.
word.latinvulgate: Et constituimus super horrea Selemiam sacerdotem, et Sadoc scribam, et Phadaiam de Levitis, et juxta eos Hanan filium Zachur, filium Mathaniæ : quoniam fideles comprobati sunt, et ipsis creditæ sunt partes fratrum suorum.
word.italian1927: e affidai la sorveglianza dei magazzini al sacerdote Scelemia, allo scriba Tsadok, e a Pedaia uno dei Leviti; ai quali aggiunsi Hanan, figliuolo di Zaccur, figliuolo di Mattania, perché erano reputati uomini fedeli. Il loro ufficio era di fare le repartizioni tra i loro fratelli.
word.german1912: Und ich setzte über die Vorräte Selemja, den Priester, und Zadok, den Schriftgelehrten, und aus den Leviten Pedaja und ihnen zur Hand Hanan, den Sohn Sakkurs, des Sohnes Matthanjas; denn sie wurden für treu gehalten, und ihnen ward befohlen, ihren Brüdern auszuteilen.
word.french1910: Je confiai la surveillance des magasins à Schélémia, le sacrificateur, à Tsadok, le scribe, et à Pedaja, l'un des Lévites, et je leur adjoignis Hanan, fils de Zaccur, fils de Matthania, car ils avaient la réputation d'être fidèles. Ils furent chargés de faire les distributions à leurs frères.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我委派示利米雅祭司、經學家撒督和利未人毗大雅作庫官，管理庫房；他們的助手是瑪他尼的孫子、撒刻的兒子哈難；這些人都是忠信可靠的；他們的責任是把人奉獻的各物分給他們的兄弟。
word.korean: 내가 제사장 셀레먀와, 서기관 사독과, 레위 사람 브다야로 고지기를 삼고 맛다냐의 손자 삭굴의 아들 하난으로 버금을 삼았나니 이는 저희가 충직한 자로 인정됨이라 그 직분은 형제들에게 분배하는 일이였느니라
word.tagalog: At ginawa kong mga tagaingat-yaman sa mga ingatang-yaman, si Selemias na saserdote, at si Sadoc na kalihim, at sa mga Levita, si Pedaias: at kasunod nila ay si Hanan na anak ni Zaccur, na anak ni Mathanias: sapagka't sila'y nangabilang na tapat, at ang kanilang mga katungkulan ay magbahagi sa kanilang mga kapatid.
word.maori: Na ka whakaritea e ahau he kaitiaki mo nga taonga, ko Heremia tohunga, ko Haroko karaipi, a o nga Riwaiti ko Peraia; i to ratou taha ko Hanana tama a Takuru tama a Matania: i kiia hoki ratou he hunga pono; a ko ta ratou, he tuwha ma o ratou tuak ana, teina.
word.cebuano: Ug nagtudlo ako ug mga mamahandi nga mag-atiman sa mga tipiganan sa mga bahandi, si Selemias nga sacerdote, ug si Sadoc nga magsusulat, ug sa mga Levihanon, si Pedaias; ug sunod kanila si Hanan anak nga lalake ni Zaccur, anak nga lalake ni Mathanias; kay sila giisip nga matinumanon ug ang ilang katungdanan mao ang pagbahinbahin ngadto sa ilang mga kaigsoonan.
word.hebrew: יג ואוצרה על אוצרות שלמיה הכהן וצדוק הסופר ופדיה מן הלוים ועל ידם חנן בן זכור בן מתניה  כי נאמנים נחשבו ועליהם לחלק לאחיהם  {פ}
word.hebrewmodern: ואוצרה על אוצרות שלמיה הכהן וצדוק הסופר ופדיה מן הלוים ועל ידם חנן בן זכור בן מתניה כי נאמנים נחשבו ועליהם לחלק לאחיהם׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version

word.kjv: For there is no faithfulness in their mouth; their inward part is very wickedness; their throat is an open sepulchre; they flatter with their tongue.
word.thailand: เพราะในปากของเขาเหล่านั้นไม่มีความสัตย์ซื่อ จิตใจของเขาก็คือความชั่วร้าย ลำคอของเขาคือหลุมฝังศพที่เปิดอยู่ เขาประจบสอพลอด้วยลิ้นของเขา
word.spanish1909: Porque no hay en su boca rectitud: Sus entrañas son pravedades; Sepulcro abierto su garganta: Con su lengua lisonjearán.
word.latinvulgate: Domine, deduc me in justitia tua : propter inimicos meos dirige in conspectu tuo viam meam.
word.italian1927: poiché in bocca loro non v’è sincerità, il loro interno è pieno di malizia; la loro gola è un sepolcro aperto, lusingano con la loro lingua.
word.german1912: Denn in ihrem Munde ist nichts Gewisses; ihr Inwendiges ist Herzeleid. Ihr Rachen ist ein offenes Grab; denn mit ihren Zungen heucheln sie.
word.french1910: Car il n'y a point de sincérité dans leur bouche; Leur coeur est rempli de malice, Leur gosier est un sépulcre ouvert, Et ils ont sur la langue des paroles flatteuses.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為他們的口裡沒有真話，他們的內心充滿毀滅人的意圖，他們的喉嚨是敞開的墳墓，他們用舌頭弄詭詐。
word.korean: 저희 입에 신실함이 없고 저희 심중이 심히 악하며 저희 목구멍은 열린 무덤같고 저희 혀로는 아첨하나이다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't walang pagtatapat sa kanilang bibig; ang kanilang kalooban ay tunay na kasamaan; ang kanilang lalamunan ay bukas na libingan; sila'y nanganunuya ng kanilang dila.
word.maori: Kahore hoki he pono i o ratou mangai; he kino kau a roto i a ratou; he urupa puare noa o ratou korokoro; e patipati ana o ratou arero.
word.cebuano: Kay sa ilang baba walay pagkamatinumanon; Sa ilang sulod nga bahin lonlon mga kadautan; Ang ilang totonlan maoy usa ka lubnganan nga inablihan: Magaulog-ulog sila uban sa ilang dila.
word.hebrew: ט  יהוה נחני בצדקתך--למען שוררי    הושר (הישר) לפני דרכך
word.hebrewmodern: כי אין בפיהו נכונה קרבם הוות קבר פתוח גרונם לשונם יחליקון׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: κύριε ὁδήγησόν με ἐν τῇ δικαιοσύνῃ σου ἕνεκα τῶν ἐχθρῶν μου κατεύθυνον ἐνώπιόν μου τὴν ὁδόν σου

word.kjv: Help, LORD; for the godly man ceaseth; for the faithful fail from among the children of men.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ขอทรงโปรดช่วยเพราะคนที่ตามทางของพระเจ้าไม่มีอีกแล้ว และคนสุจริตได้อันตรธานไปจากบุตรทั้งหลายของมนุษย์
word.spanish1909: Al Músico principal: sobre Seminith: Salmo de David. SALVA, oh Jehová, porque se acabaron los misericordiosos: Porque se han acabado los fieles de entre los hijos de los hombres.
word.latinvulgate: In finem. Psalmus David. Usquequo, Domine, oblivisceris me in finem ? usquequo avertis faciem tuam a me ?
word.italian1927: Al Capo de’ musici. Sopra l’ottava. Salmo di Davide. Salva, o Eterno, poiché l’uomo pio vien meno, e i fedeli vengono a mancare tra i figliuoli degli uomini.
word.german1912: Ein Psalm Davids, vorzusingen, auf acht Saiten.  Hilf, HERR! die Heiligen haben abgenommen, und der Gläubigen ist wenig unter den Menschenkindern.
word.french1910: Au chef des chantres. Sur la harpe à huit cordes. Psaume de David. Sauve, Eternel! car les hommes pieux s'en vont, Les fidèles disparaissent parmi les fils de l'homme.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 大衛的詩，交給詩班長，調用“舍尼”。耶和華啊！求你施行拯救，因為虔誠人沒有了，在世人中的信實人也不見了。
word.korean: (다윗의 시. 영장으로 스미닛에 맞춘 노래) 여호와여, 도우소서 경건한 자가 끊어지며 충실한 자가 인생 중에 없어지도소이다
word.tagalog: Tumulong ka, Panginoon, sapagka't ang banal na tao ay nalilipol; sapagka't nagkukulang ng tapat sa gitna ng mga anak ng mga tao.
word.maori: ¶ Ki te tino kaiwhakatangi. Heminiti. He himene na Rawiri. Whakaorangia, e Ihowa; ka mutu hoki nga tangata tapu; ka taweke atu te hunga pono i roto i nga tama a te tangata.
word.cebuano: Tabangi, Oh Jehova, kay ang tawo nga diosnon nahurot; Kay ang matinumanon nagakawagtang gikan sa taliwala sa mga anak sa mga tawo.
word.hebrewmodern: למנצח על השמינית מזמור לדוד הושיעה יהוה כי גמר חסיד כי פסו אמונים מבני אדם׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: εἰς τὸ τέλος ψαλμὸς τῷ δαυιδ

word.kjv: O love the LORD, all ye his saints: for the LORD preserveth the faithful, and plentifully rewardeth the proud doer.
word.thailand: ท่านบรรดาวิสุทธิชนทั้งสิ้นของพระองค์เอ๋ย จงรักพระเยโฮวาห์ เพราะพระเยโฮวาห์ทรงพิทักษ์รักษาคนสัตย์ซื่อไว้ แต่ทรงสนองผู้กระทำอหังการอย่างเต็มขนาด
word.spanish1909: Amad á Jehová todos vosotros sus santos: A los fieles guarda Jehová, Y paga abundantemente al que obra con soberbia.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Amate l’Eterno, voi tutti i suoi santi! L’Eterno preserva i fedeli, e rende ampia retribuzione a chi procede alteramente.
word.german1912: Liebet den HERRN, alle seine Heiligen! Die Gläubigen behütet der HERR und vergilt reichlich dem, der Hochmut übt.
word.french1910: Aimez l'Eternel, vous qui avez de la piété! L'Eternel garde les fidèles, Et il punit sévèrement les orgueilleux.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華的眾聖民哪！你們都要愛耶和華；耶和華保護誠實的人，卻嚴厲地報應行事驕傲的人。
word.korean: 너희 모든 성도들아 여호와를 사랑하라 ! 여호와께서 성실한 자를 보호하시고 교만히 행하는 자에게 엄중히 갚으시느니라
word.tagalog: Oh ibigin ninyo ang Panginoon, ninyong lahat na mga banal niya: pinalalagi ng Panginoon ang tapat, at pinanghihigantihang lubos ang manggagawang palalo.
word.maori: Arohaina a Ihowa, e tana hunga tapu katoa: e tiakina ana e Ihowa te hunga pono, a he nui tana utu ki te kaimahi whakapehapeha.
word.cebuano: Oh higugmaon ninyo si Jehova, kamong tanan nga mga balaan niya: Si Jehova magabantay sa mga matinumanon, Ug panimaslan niya sa makadaghan gayud ang nagabuhat nga adunay palabilabi.
word.hebrew: כג  ואני אמרתי בחפזי--    נגרזתי מנגד עיניך אכן--שמעת קול תחנוני    בשועי אליך
word.hebrewmodern: אהבו את יהוה כל חסידיו אמונים נצר יהוה ומשלם על יתר עשה גאוה׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Thy mercy, O LORD, is in the heavens; and thy faithfulness reacheth unto the clouds.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ความเมตตาของพระองค์อยู่ในฟ้าสวรรค์ ความสัตย์ซื่อของพระองค์ไปถึงเมฆ
word.spanish1909: Jehová, hasta los cielos es tu misericordia; Tu verdad hasta las nubes.
word.latinvulgate: Revela Domino viam tuam, et spera in eo, et ipse faciet.
word.italian1927: O Eterno, la tua benignità va fino al cielo, e la tua fedeltà fino alle nuvole.
word.german1912: HERR, deine Güte reicht, soweit der Himmel ist, und deine Wahrheit, soweit die Wolken gehen.
word.french1910: Eternel! ta bonté atteint jusqu'aux cieux, Ta fidélité jusqu'aux nues.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！你的慈愛上及諸天，你的信實高達雲霄。
word.korean: 주의 의는 하나님의 산들과 같고 주의 판단은 큰 바다와 일반이라 여호와여, 주는 사람과 짐승을 보호하시나이다
word.tagalog: Ang iyong kagandahang-loob, Oh Panginoon, ay nasa mga langit: ang iyong pagtatapat ay umaabot hanggang sa langit.
word.maori: ¶ Kei nga rangi, e Ihowa, tau mahi tohu: tutuki noa atu tou pono ki nga kapua.
word.cebuano: Oh Jehova, ang imong mahigugmaong-kalolot anaa sa mga langit; Ang imong pagkamatinumanon nagaabut ngadto sa mga langit.
word.hebrew: ה  און יחשב--על-משכבו    יתיצב על-דרך לא-טוב רע לא ימאס
word.hebrewmodern: יהוה בהשמים חסדך אמונתך עד שחקים׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ἀποκάλυψον πρὸς κύριον τὴν ὁδόν σου καὶ ἔλπισον ἐπ' αὐτόν καὶ αὐτὸς ποιήσει

word.kjv: I have not hid thy righteousness within my heart; I have declared thy faithfulness and thy salvation: I have not concealed thy lovingkindness and thy truth from the great congregation.
word.thailand: ข้าพระองค์มิได้งำความชอบธรรมของพระองค์ไว้แต่ในจิตใจของข้าพระองค์ ข้าพระองค์ได้พูดถึงความสัตย์ซื่อและความรอดของพระองค์ ข้าพระองค์มิได้ปิดบังความเมตตาและความจริงของพระองค์ไว้จากชุมนุมชนใหญ่โตนั้น
word.spanish1909: No encubrí tu justicia dentro de mi corazón: Tu verdad y tu salvación he dicho: No oculté tu misericordia y tu verdad en grande concurso.
word.latinvulgate: Etenim homo pacis meæ, in quo speravi, qui edebat panes meos magnificavit super me supplantationem.
word.italian1927: Io non ho nascosto la tua giustizia entro il mio cuore; ho narrato la tua fedeltà e la tua salvezza; non ho celato la tua benignità né la tua verità alla grande assemblea.

word.kjv: But turned back, and dealt unfaithfully like their fathers: they were turned aside like a deceitful bow.

word.kjv: To shew forth thy lovingkindness in the morning, and thy faithfulness every night,
word.thailand: ที่จะประกาศความเมตตาของพระองค์ในเวลาเช้า และความสัตย์สุจริตของพระองค์ในกลางคืน
word.spanish1909: Anunciar por la mañana tu misericordia, Y tu verdad en las noches,
word.latinvulgate: Parata sedes tua ex tunc ; a sæculo tu es.
word.italian1927: proclamare la mattina la tua benignità, e la tua fedeltà ogni notte,
word.german1912: des Morgens deine Gnade und des Nachts deine Wahrheit verkündigen
word.french1910: D'annoncer le matin ta bonté, Et ta fidélité pendant les nuits,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 早晨傳揚你的慈愛，夜間傳講你的信實；
word.korean: 여호와여, 주의 행사로 나를 기쁘게 하셨으니 주의 손의 행사를 인하여 내가 높이 부르리이다
word.tagalog: Upang magpakilala ng iyong kagandahang-loob sa umaga, at ng iyong pagtatapat gabigabi.
word.maori: Te whakakite i tou atawhai i te ata, i tou pono i nga po katoa;
word.cebuano: Sa pagmantala sa imong mahigugmaong-kalolot sa buntag, Ug sa imong pagkamatinumanon sa matag-gabii,
word.hebrew: ב  טוב להדות ליהוה    ולזמר לשמך עליון
word.hebrewmodern: להגיד בבקר חסדך ואמונתך בלילות׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ἕτοιμος ὁ θρόνος σου ἀπὸ τότε ἀπὸ τοῦ αἰῶνος σὺ εἶ

word.kjv: Mine eyes shall be upon the faithful of the land, that they may dwell with me: he that walketh in a perfect way, he shall serve me.
word.thailand: นัยน์ตาข้าพระองค์จะมองหาคนที่ซื่อตรงในแผ่นดิน เพื่อเขาจะอาศัยอยู่กับข้าพระองค์ ผู้ใดดำเนินในทางที่ดีรอบคอบ ผู้นั้นจะปรนนิบัติข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Mis ojos pondré en los fieles de la tierra, para que estén conmigo: El que anduviere en el camino de la perfección, éste me sevirá.
word.latinvulgate: A voce gemitus mei adhæsit os meum carni meæ.
word.italian1927: Avrò gli occhi sui fedeli del paese perché dimorino meco; chi cammina per la via dell’integrità, quello sarà mio servitore.
word.german1912: Meine Augen sehen nach den Treuen im Lande, daß sie bei mir wohnen; und habe gerne fromme Diener.
word.french1910: J'aurai les yeux sur les fidèles du pays, Pour qu'ils demeurent auprès de moi; Celui qui marche dans une voie intègre sera mon serviteur.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我的眼目必看顧國中的誠實人，使他們與我同住；行為正直的，必要侍候我。
word.korean: 내 눈이 이 땅의 충성된 자를 살펴 나와 함께 거하게 하리니 완전한 길에 행하는 자가 나를 수종하리로다
word.tagalog: Ang mga mata ko'y itititig ko sa mga tapat sa lupain, upang sila'y makatahan na kasama ko: siya na lumalakad sa sakdal na daan, siya'y mangangasiwa sa akin.
word.maori: Kei runga i nga mea pono o te whenua oku kanohi, kia noho ai ratou ki ahau: ko te tangata e haere ana i te ara tika, ka mahi tena ki ahau.
word.cebuano: Ang akong mga mata magatan-aw sa mga matinumanon sa yuta, aron sila managpuyo uban kanako: Siya nga magalakaw sa dalan sa pagkahingpit, siya magaalagad kanako.
word.hebrew: ו  עיני בנאמני-ארץ--    לשבת עמדי הלך בדרך תמים--    הוא ישרתני
word.hebrewmodern: עיני בנאמני ארץ לשבת עמדי הלך בדרך תמים הוא ישרתני׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ἀπὸ φωνῆς τοῦ στεναγμοῦ μου ἐκολλήθη τὸ ὀστοῦν μου τῇ σαρκί μου

word.kjv: I know, O LORD, that thy judgments are right, and that thou in faithfulness hast afflicted me.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ข้าพระองค์ทราบว่าคำตัดสินของพระองค์นั้นถูกต้องแล้ว และทราบว่าด้วยความซื่อตรงพระองค์ทรงให้ข้าพระองค์ทุกข์ยาก
word.spanish1909: Conozco, oh Jehová, que tus juicios son justicia, Y que conforme á tu fidelidad me afligiste.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Io so, o Eterno, che i tuoi giudizi son giusti, e che nella tua fedeltà m’hai afflitto.
word.german1912: HERR, ich weiß, daß deine Gerichte recht sind; du hast mich treulich gedemütigt.
word.french1910: Je sais, ô Eternel! que tes jugements sont justes; C'est par fidélité que tu m'as humilié.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！我知道你的判語是公義的，為了你的信實，你使我受苦。
word.korean: 여호와여, 주께서 가까이 계시오니 주의 모든 계명은 진리니이다
word.tagalog: Talastas ko, Oh Panginoon na ang mga kahatulan mo ay matuwid, at sa pagtatapat, iyo akong dinalamhati.
word.maori: ¶ E matau ana ahau, e Ihowa, he tika au whakaritenga; a he pono nou i pehia ai toku ngakau e koe.
word.cebuano: Nahibalo ako, Oh Jehova, nga ang imong mga paghukom matarung man, Ug nga sa imong pagka-matinumanon gisakit mo ako.
word.hebrew: עה  ידעתי יהוה כי-צדק משפטיך    ואמונה עניתני
word.hebrewmodern: ידעתי יהוה כי צדק משפטיך ואמונה עניתני׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version

word.kjv: All thy commandments are faithful: they persecute me wrongfully; help thou me.
word.thailand: พระบัญญัติของพระองค์ทั้งสิ้นสัตย์ซื่อ เขาข่มเหงข้าพระองค์ด้วยความเท็จ ขอทรงช่วยข้าพระองค์ด้วย
word.spanish1909: Todos tus mandamientos son verdad: Sin causa me persiguen; ayúdame.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Tutti i tuoi comandamenti sono fedeltà; costoro mi perseguitano a torto; soccorrimi!
word.german1912: Deine Gebote sind eitel Wahrheit. Sie verfolgen mich mit Lügen; hilf mir.
word.french1910: Tous tes commandements ne sont que fidélité; Ils me persécutent sans cause: secours-moi!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你的一切命令都是可信靠的；他們以詭詐逼迫我，求你幫助我。
word.korean: 사람이 많은 탈취물을 얻은 것처럼 나는 주의 말씀을 즐거워하나이다
word.tagalog: Lahat mong mga utos ay tapat. Kanilang inuusig ako na may kamalian; tulungan mo ako.
word.maori: Pono tonu au whakahau katoa: e tukino takekore ana ratou i ahau; awhinatia mai ahau.
word.cebuano: Ang tanan nimong mga sugo matinumanon man: Sila nanaglutos kanako sa pagkadili-matarung; tabangan mo ako.
word.hebrew: פו  כל-מצותיך אמונה    שקר רדפוני עזרני
word.hebrewmodern: כל מצותיך אמונה שקר רדפוני עזרני׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Thy faithfulness is unto all generations: thou hast established the earth, and it abideth.
word.thailand: ความซื่อตรงของพระองค์ดำรงอยู่ทุกชั่วอายุ พระองค์ทรงสถาปนาแผ่นดินโลกและมันก็ตั้งอยู่
word.spanish1909: Por generación y generación es tu verdad: Tú afirmaste la tierra, y persevera.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: La tua fedeltà dura d’età in età; tu hai fondato la terra ed essa sussiste.
word.german1912: deine Wahrheit währet für und für. Du hast die Erde zugerichtet, und sie bleibt stehen.
word.french1910: De génération en génération ta fidélité subsiste; Tu as fondé la terre, et elle demeure ferme.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你的信實存到萬代；你堅立了地，地就長存。
word.korean: 여호와여, 내가 주의 구원을 사모하였사오며 주의 법을 즐거워하나이다
word.tagalog: Ang iyong pagtatapat ay sa lahat ng sali't saling lahi: iyong itinatag ang lupa, at lumalagi.
word.maori: Kei nga whakatupuranga katoa tou pono: whakaungia ana e koe te whenua, a e tu nei ano.
word.cebuano: Ang imong pagkamatinumanon alang man ngadto sa tanang mga kaliwatan: Imong gitukod ang yuta, ug kini nagapadayon.
word.hebrew: צ  לדר ודר אמונתך    כוננת ארץ ותעמד
word.hebrewmodern: לדר ודר אמונתך כוננת ארץ ותעמד׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Thy testimonies that thou hast commanded are righteous and very faithful.
word.thailand: บรรดาพระโอวาทที่พระองค์ทรงกำหนดไว้ก็ชอบธรรมและสัตย์สุจริตทั้งสิ้น
word.spanish1909: Tus testimonios, que has recomendado, Son rectos y muy fieles.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Tu hai prescritto le tue testimonianze con giustizia e con grande fedeltà.
word.german1912: Du hast die Zeugnisse deiner Gerechtigkeit und die Wahrheit hart geboten.
word.french1910: Tu fondes tes préceptes sur la justice Et sur la plus grande fidélité.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你以公義和至誠，命定了你的法度。
word.korean: 악인의 줄이 내게 두루 얽혔을지라도 나는 주의 법을 잊지 아니하였나이다
word.tagalog: Iniutos mo ang mga patotoo mo sa katuwiran at totoong may pagtatapat.
word.maori: He tika, he pono rawa au whakaaturanga i whakahaua mai e koe.
word.cebuano: Gisugo mo ang imong mga pagpamatuod diha sa pagkamatarung Ug sa pagkamatinumanon uyamut.
word.hebrew: קלח  צוית צדק עדתיך    ואמונה מאד
word.hebrewmodern: צוית צדק עדתיך ואמונה מאד׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Hear my prayer, O LORD, give ear to my supplications: in thy faithfulness answer me, and in thy righteousness.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ขอทรงสดับคำอธิษฐานของข้าพระองค์ ขอทรงเงี่ยพระกรรณสดับคำวิงวอนของข้าพระองค์ ขอทรงตอบข้าพระองค์ตามความสัตย์สุจริตของพระองค์ ตามความชอบธรรมของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Salmo de David. OH Jehová, oye mi oración, escucha mis ruegos: Respóndeme por tu verdad, por tu justicia.
word.latinvulgate: Psalmus David. Adversus Goliath. Benedictus Dominus Deus meus, qui docet manus meas ad prælium, et digitos meos ad bellum.
word.italian1927: Salmo di Davide. O Eterno, ascolta la mia preghiera, porgi l’orecchio alle mie supplicazioni; nella tua fedeltà e nella tua giustizia, rispondimi,
word.german1912: Ein Psalm Davids. HERR, erhöre mein Gebet, vernimm mein Flehen um deiner Wahrheit willen, erhöre mich um deiner Gerechtigkeit willen
word.french1910: Psaume de David. Eternel, écoute ma prière, prête l'oreille à mes supplications! Exauce-moi dans ta fidélité, dans ta justice!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 大衛的詩。耶和華啊！求你聽我的禱告，留心聽我的懇求，憑你的信實和公義應允我。（本節在《馬索拉抄本》包括細字標題）
word.korean: (다윗의 시) 여호와여, 내 기도를 들으시며 내 간구에 귀를 기울이시고 주의 진실과 의로 내게 응답하소서
word.tagalog: Dinggin mo ang dalangin ko Oh Panginoon; pakinggan mo ang aking mga pamanhik: sa iyong pagtatapat ay sagutin mo ako, at sa iyong katuwiran.
word.maori: ¶ He himene na Rawiri. E Ihowa, whakarongo ki taku inoi, kia titaha mai tou taringa ki aku inoi: whakahokia mai he kupu ki ahau i runga i tou pono, i runga i tou tika.
word.cebuano: Dungga ang akong pag-ampo, Oh Jehova; patalinghugi ang akong mga pangaliyupo: Sa imong pagkamatinumanon, ug sa imong pagkamatarung, tubaga ako.
word.hebrew: א  מזמור לדוד יהוה שמע תפלתי--    האזינה אל-תחנוני באמנתך ענני    בצדקתך
word.hebrewmodern: מזמור לדוד יהוה שמע תפלתי האזינה אל תחנוני באמנתך ענני בצדקתך׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: τῷ δαυιδ πρὸς τὸν γολιαδ εὐλογητὸς κύριος ὁ θεός μου ὁ διδάσκων τὰς χεῖράς μου εἰς παράταξιν τοὺς δακτύλους μου εἰς πόλεμον

word.kjv: A talebearer revealeth secrets: but he that is of a faithful spirit concealeth the matter.
word.thailand: บุคคลที่เที่ยวซุบซิบก็เผยความลับ แต่บุคคลที่มีใจสัตย์ซื่อย่อมปิดบังสิ่งหนึ่งสิ่งใดไว้ได้
word.spanish1909: El que anda en chismes, descubre el secreto: Mas el de espíritu fiel encubre la cosa.
word.latinvulgate: Qui ambulat fraudulenter, revelat arcana ; qui autem fidelis est animi, celat amici commissum.
word.italian1927: Chi va sparlando svela i segreti, ma chi ha lo spirito leale tien celata la cosa.
word.german1912: Ein Verleumder verrät, was er heimlich weiß; aber wer eines getreuen Herzens ist, verbirgt es.
word.french1910: Celui qui répand la calomnie dévoile les secrets, Mais celui qui a l'esprit fidèle les garde.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 到處搬弄是非的，洩露祕密，心裡誠實的，遮隱事情。
word.korean: 도략이 없으면 백성이 망하여도 모사가 많으면 평안을 누리느니라
word.tagalog: Siyang yumayaong mapaghatid dumapit ay naghahayag ng mga lihim: nguni't ang may diwang tapat ay nagtatakip ng bagay.
word.maori: Ko te tangata haere, ka kawekawe korero e whaki ana i nga mea ngaro: ko te tangata i te wairua pono, e hipoki ana i te korero.
word.cebuano: Kadtong nagasuroy-suroy ingon sa usa ka tabian nagabutyag sa mga tinago; Apan kadtong may pagkamatinumanon sa espiritu nagatago sa usa ka butang.
word.hebrew: יג  הולך רכיל מגלה-סוד    ונאמן-רוח מכסה דבר
word.hebrewmodern: הולך רכיל מגלה סוד ונאמן רוח מכסה דבר׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: οἷς μὴ ὑπάρχει κυβέρνησις πίπτουσιν ὥσπερ φύλλα σωτηρία δὲ ὑπάρχει ἐν πολλῇ βουλῇ

word.kjv: A wicked messenger falleth into mischief: but a faithful ambassador is health.
word.thailand: ผู้สื่อสารที่ชั่วร้ายหลงไปในความร้าย แต่ทูตที่สัตย์ซื่อนำการรักษามาให้
word.spanish1909: El mal mensajero caerá en mal: Mas el mensajero fiel es medicina.
word.latinvulgate: Nuntius impii cade in malum ; legatus autem fidelis, sanitas.
word.italian1927: Il messo malvagio cade in sciagure, ma l’ambasciatore fedele reca guarigione.
word.german1912: Ein gottloser Bote bringt Unglück; aber ein treuer Bote ist heilsam.
word.french1910: Un envoyé méchant tombe dans le malheur, Mais un messager fidèle apporte la guérison.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 奸惡的使者，必陷在禍患裡（“必陷在禍患裡”或譯：“必使人陷在禍患裡”）；忠心的使臣，使人復原。
word.korean: 훈계를 저버리는 자에게는 궁핍과 수욕이 이르거니와 경계를 지키는 자는 존영을 얻느니라
word.tagalog: Ang masamang sugo ay nahuhulog sa kasamaan: nguni't ang tapat na sugo ay kagalingan.
word.maori: ¶ Ka hinga te karere kino ki te kino; ko te karere pono ia, ano he rongoa.
word.cebuano: Ang usa ka dautan nga sinugo mahulog ngadto sa kadaut; Apan ang usa ka matinumanon nga sinaligan maoy makaayo.
word.hebrew: יז  מלאך רשע יפל ברע    וציר אמונים מרפא
word.hebrewmodern: מלאך רשע יפל ברע וציר אמונים מרפא׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: βασιλεὺς θρασὺς ἐμπεσεῖται εἰς κακά ἄγγελος δὲ πιστὸς ῥύσεται αὐτόν

word.kjv: A faithful witness will not lie: but a false witness will utter lies.
word.thailand: พยานที่สัตย์ซื่อจะไม่มุสา แต่พยานเท็จจะกล่าวคำมุสา
word.spanish1909: El testigo verdadero no mentirá: Mas el testigo falso hablará mentiras.
word.latinvulgate: Testis fidelis non mentitur ; profert autem mendacium dolosus testis.
word.italian1927: Il testimonio fedele non mentisce, ma il testimonio falso spaccia menzogne.
word.german1912: Ein treuer Zeuge lügt nicht; aber ein Falscher Zeuge redet frech Lügen.
word.french1910: Un témoin fidèle ne ment pas, Mais un faux témoin dit des mensonges.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 誠實的證人不說謊話；虛偽的證人吐出謊言。
word.korean: 신실한 증인은 거짓말을 아니하여도 거짓 증인은 거짓말을 뱉느니라
word.tagalog: Ang tapat na saksi ay hindi magbubulaan: nguni't ang sinungaling na saksi ay nagbabadya ng mga kasinungalingan.
word.maori: ¶ E kore te kaiwhakaatu pono e teka; ka puaki ia te teka i te kaiwhakaatu teka.
word.cebuano: Ang usa ka matinumanon nga saksi dili mobakak; Apan ang bakakon nga saksi magapamulong ug mga bakak.
word.hebrew: ה  עד אמונים לא יכזב    ויפיח כזבים עד שקר
word.hebrewmodern: עד אמונים לא יכזב ויפיח כזבים עד שקר׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: μάρτυς πιστὸς οὐ ψεύδεται ἐκκαίει δὲ ψεύδη μάρτυς ἄδικος

word.kjv: Most men will proclaim every one his own goodness: but a faithful man who can find?
word.thailand: คนเป็นอันมากป่าวร้องความดีของเขาเอง แต่ใครจะหาคนสัตย์ซื่อพบเล่า
word.spanish1909: Muchos hombres publican cada uno su liberalidad: Mas hombre de verdad, ¿quién lo hallará?
word.latinvulgate: Multi homines misericordes vocantur ; virum autem fidelem quis inveniet ?
word.italian1927: Molta gente vanta la propria bontà; ma un uomo fedele chi lo troverà?
word.german1912: Viele Menschen werden fromm gerühmt; aber wer will finden einen, der rechtschaffen fromm sei?
word.french1910: Beaucoup de gens proclament leur bonté; Mais un homme fidèle, qui le trouvera?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 很多人自稱忠誠，但信實的人，誰能遇著呢？
word.korean: 많은 사람은 각기 자기의 인자함을 자랑하나니 충성된 자를 누가 만날 수 있으랴
word.tagalog: Maraming tao ay magtatanyag bawa't isa ng kaniyang sariling kagandahang-loob: nguni't sinong makakasumpong sa taong tapat?
word.maori: ¶ Ko ta te tini o te tangata he kauwhau i tona atawhai ake; ko wai ia e kite i te tangata pono?
word.cebuano: Ang kadaghanan sa mga tawo magabutyag sa tagsatagsa sa iyang kaugalingong kalolot; Apan sa usa ka matinumanon nga tawo kinsay makakaplag kaniya ?
word.hebrew: ו  רב-אדם--יקרא איש חסדו    ואיש אמונים מי ימצא
word.hebrewmodern: רב אדם יקרא איש חסדו ואיש אמונים מי ימצא׃

word.greekot: μέγα ἄνθρωπος καὶ τίμιον ἀνὴρ ἐλεήμων ἄνδρα δὲ πιστὸν ἔργον εὑρεῖν

word.kjv: As the cold of snow in the time of harvest, so is a faithful messenger to them that send him: for he refresheth the soul of his masters.
word.thailand: หิมะให้ความเย็นในฤดูเกี่ยวอย่างไร ผู้สื่อสารที่สัตย์ซื่อย่อมทำให้จิตวิญญาณของนายผู้ใช้เขาชุ่มชื่นอย่างนั้น
word.spanish1909: Como frío de nieve en tiempo de la siega, Así es el mensajero fiel á los que lo envían: Pues al alma de su señor da refrigerio.
word.latinvulgate: Sicut frigus nivis in die messis, ita legatus fidelis ei qui misit eum : animam ipsius requiescere facit.
word.italian1927: Il messaggero fedele, per quelli che lo mandano, è come il fresco della neve al tempo della mèsse; esso ristora l’anima del suo padrone.
word.german1912: Wie die Kühle des Schnees zur Zeit der Ernte, so ist ein treuer Bote dem, der ihn gesandt hat, und labt seines Herrn Seele.
word.french1910: Comme la fraîcheur de la neige au temps de la moisson, Ainsi est un messager fidèle pour celui qui l'envoie; Il restaure l'âme de son maître.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 忠信的使者對那些差遣他的人來說，好像在收割的時候，有冰雪的涼氣，使主人精神舒暢。
word.korean: 충성된 사자는 그를 보낸 이에게 마치 추수하는 날에 얼음 냉수같아서 능히 그 주인의 마음을 시원케 하느니라
word.tagalog: Kung paano ang lamig ng niebe sa panahon ng pagaani, gayon ang tapat na sugo sa kanila na nangagsugo sa kaniya; sapagka't kaniyang pinagiginhawa ang kaluluwa ng kaniyang mga panginoon.
word.maori: ¶ Rite tonu ki te matao o te hukarere i te kotinga witi te karere pono ki ona kaingare; ka ora hoki i a ia te ngakau o ona ariki.
word.cebuano: Ingon sa kabugnawon sa nieve sa panahon sa ting-ani, Busa mao man ang usa ka q2 matinumanon nga sulogoon kanila nga nagasugo kaniya; Kay siya nagalipay sa kalag sa iyang mga agalon.
word.hebrew: יג  כצנת שלג ביום קציר--ציר נאמן לשלחיו    ונפש אדניו ישיב

word.kjv: Confidence in an unfaithful man in time of trouble is like a broken tooth, and a foot out of joint.
word.thailand: การวางใจในคนที่ไม่ซื่อในยามลำบาก ก็เหมือนฟันที่หักเสียหรือเท้าที่หลุดจากข้อต่อ
word.spanish1909: Diente quebrado y pie resbalador, Es la confianza en el prevaricador en tiempo de angustia.
word.latinvulgate: Dens putridus, et pes lassus, qui sperat super infideli in die angustiæ,
word.italian1927: La fiducia in un perfido, nel dì della distretta, è un dente rotto, un piede slogato.
word.german1912: Die Hoffnung auf einen Treulosen zur Zeit der Not ist wie ein fauler Zahn und gleitender Fuß.
word.french1910: Comme une dent cassée et un pied qui chancelle, Ainsi est la confiance en un perfide au jour de la détresse.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 遭遇災難的時候，倚靠奸詐的人，就像倚靠壞牙和不穩的腳。
word.korean: 환난날에 진실치 못한 자를 의뢰하는 의뢰는 부러진 이와 위골된 발 같으니라

word.maori: ¶ Ko te whakawhirinaki ki te tangata tinihanga i te wa o te raru, e rite ana ki te niho whati, ki te waewae kua takoki.
word.cebuano: Ang pagsalig diha sa usa ka maluibon nga tawo sa panahon sa kasamok Mahasama sa usa ka naputol nga ngipon, ug sa usa ka tiil nga nalisa.

word.thailand: คนที่สัตย์ซื่อจะได้รับพรมากมาย แต่ผู้ที่รีบมั่งคั่งจะไม่มีโทษหามิได้
word.spanish1909: El hombre de verdad tendrá muchas bendiciones: Mas el que se apresura á enriquecer, no será sin culpa.

word.italian1927: L’uomo fedele sarà colmato di benedizioni, ma chi ha fretta d’arricchire non rimarrà impunito.

word.chinesencvtraditional: 忠實的人必有大福；急於發財的，不免受罰。

word.cebuano: Ang usa ka matinumanon nga tawo magamadagayaon sa mga panalangin; Apan kadtong nagadali sa pagkaadunahan dili makalikay sa silot.

word.spanish1909: El rey que juzga con verdad á los pobres, Su trono será firme para siempre.

word.german1912: Ein König, der die Armen treulich richtet, des Thron wird ewig bestehen.
word.french1910: Un roi qui juge fidèlement les pauvres Aura son trône affermi pour toujours.

word.cebuano: Ang hari nga sa pagkamatinumanon nagahukom sa kabus, Ang iyang trono malig-on sa walay katapusan.

word.spanish1909: Y restituiré tus jueces como al principio, y tus consejeros como de primero: entonces te llamarán Ciudad de justicia, Ciudad fiel.
word.latinvulgate: Et restituam judices tuos ut fuerunt prius, et consiliarios tuos sicut antiquitus ; post hæc vocaberis civitas justi, urbs fidelis.
word.italian1927: Ristabilirò i tuoi giudici com’erano anticamente, e i tuoi consiglieri com’erano al principio. Dopo questo, sarai chiamata "la città della giustizia", "la città fedele".
word.german1912: und dir wieder Richter geben, wie zuvor waren, und Ratsherren wie im Anfang. Alsdann wirst du eine Stadt der Gerechtigkeit und eine fromme Stadt heißen.
word.french1910: Je rétablirai tes juges tels qu'ils étaient autrefois, Et tes conseillers tels qu'ils étaient au commencement. Après cela, on t'appellera ville de la justice, Cité fidèle.

word.korean: 내가 너의 사사들을 처음과 같이 너의 모사들을 본래와 같이 회복할 것이라 그리한 후에야 네가 의의 성읍이라,신실한 고을이라 칭함이 되리라 하셨나니

word.cebuano: Ug igauli ko ang imong mga maghuhukom sama sa una, ug ang imong mga magtatambag ingon sa sinugdan: sa tapus niana ikaw pagatawgon, Ang ciudad sa pagkamatarung, usa ka lungsod nga matinumanon.

word.kjv: And I took unto me faithful witnesses to record, Uriah the priest, and Zechariah the son of Jeberechiah.
word.thailand: และข้าพเจ้าได้พยานที่เชื่อถือได้ คือ อุรีอาห์ปุโรหิต และเศคาริยาห์บุตรชายของเยเบเรคียาห์ให้บันทึกไว้เพื่อข้าพเจ้า

word.tagalog: At magdadala ako ng mga tapat na saksi upang mangagpaalaala, si Urias na saserdote, at si Zacarias na anak ni Jeberechias.
word.maori: Na maku e mea etahi kaiwhakaatu pono hei whakaatu mo taku, ara a Uria tohunga raua ko Tekaria tama a Teperekia.
word.cebuano: Ug akong kuhaon alang kanako ang mga saksi nga matinumanon aron sa pagtimaan, si Urias ang sacerdote, ug si Zacarias ang anak nga lalake ni Jeberechias.
word.hebrew: ב ואעידה לי עדים נאמנים--את אוריה הכהן ואת זכריהו בן יברכיהו
word.hebrewmodern: ואעידה לי עדים נאמנים את אוריה הכהן ואת זכריהו בן יברכיהו׃

word.kjv: And righteousness shall be the girdle of his loins, and faithfulness the girdle of his reins.
word.thailand: ความชอบธรรมจะเป็นผ้าคาดเอวของท่าน และความสัตย์สุจริตจะเป็นผ้าคาดบั้นเอวของท่าน
word.spanish1909: Y será la justicia cinto de sus lomos, y la fidelidad ceñidor de sus riñones.
word.latinvulgate: Et erit justitia cingulum lumborum ejus, et fides cinctorium renum ejus.
word.italian1927: La giustizia sarà la cintura delle sue reni, e la fedeltà la cintura dei suoi fianchi.
word.german1912: Gerechtigkeit wird der Gurt seiner Lenden sein und der Glaube der Gurt seiner Hüften.
word.french1910: La justice sera la ceinture de ses flancs, Et la fidélité la ceinture de ses reins.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 公義必作他腰間的帶子，信實必作他脅下的帶子。
word.korean: 공의로 그 허리띠를 삼으며 성실로 몸의 띠를 삼으리라
word.tagalog: At katuwiran ang magiging bigkis ng kaniyang baywang, at pagtatapat ang pamigkis ng kaniyang mga balakang.
word.maori: A hei whitiki te tika mo tona hope, hei whitiki ano te pono mo ona whatumanawa.
word.cebuano: Ug ang pagkamatarung mao ang bakus sa iyang hawak, ug ang pagkamatinumanon mao ang bakus sa iyang lawas.

word.greekot: καὶ ἔσται δικαιοσύνῃ ἐζωσμένος τὴν ὀσφὺν αὐτοῦ καὶ ἀληθείᾳ εἰλημένος τὰς πλευράς

word.kjv: O LORD, thou art my God; I will exalt thee, I will praise thy name; for thou hast done wonderful things; thy counsels of old are faithfulness and truth.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ พระองค์ทรงเป็นพระเจ้าของข้าพระองค์ ข้าพระองค์จะยอพระเกียรติพระองค์ ข้าพระองค์จะสรรเสริญพระนามของพระองค์ เพราะพระองค์ได้ทรงกระทำการมหัศจรรย์ แผนงานที่พระองค์ทรงดำริไว้นานมาแล้วก็สัตย์ซื่อและเป็นความจริง
word.spanish1909: JEHOVA, tú eres mi Dios: te ensalzaré, alabaré tu nombre; porque has hecho maravillas, los consejos antiguos, la verdad firme.
word.latinvulgate: Domine, Deus meus es tu ; exaltabo te, et confitebor nomini tuo : quoniam fecisti mirabilia, cogitationes antiquas fideles. Amen.
word.italian1927: O Eterno, tu sei il mio Dio; io t’esalterò, celebrerò il tuo nome, perché hai fatto cose maravigliose; i tuoi disegni, concepiti da tempo, sono fedeli e stabili.
word.german1912: HERR, du bist mein Gott! dich preise ich; ich lobe deinen Namen, denn du tust Wunder; dein Ratschlüsse von alters her sind treu und wahrhaftig.
word.french1910: O Eternel! tu es mon Dieu; Je t'exalterai, je célébrerai ton nom, Car tu as fait des choses merveilleuses; Tes desseins conçus à l'avance se sont fidèlement accomplis.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 稱頌的詩歌耶和華啊！你是我的　神，我要尊崇你，稱謝你的名，因為你以信實真誠作成了奇妙的事，就是你遠古以前所計劃的事。
word.korean: 여호와여, 주는 나의 하나님이시라 내가 주를 높이고 주의 이름을 찬송하오리니 주는 기사를 옛적의 정하신 뜻대로 성실함과 진실함으로 행하셨음이라
word.tagalog: Oh Panginoon, ikaw ay aking Dios; aking ibubunyi ka, aking pupurihin ang iyong pangalan; sapagka't ikaw ay gumawa ng kagilagilalas na bagay, sa makatuwid baga'y ang iyong binalak noong una, sa pagtatapat at katotohanan.
word.maori: ¶ E Ihowa, ko koe toku Atua; ka whakanuia koe e ahau, ka whakamoemititia e ahau tou ingoa; he mahi whakamiharo hoki au, ara ko nga whakaaro i takoto nei i mua, i runga i te pono, i te tika.
word.cebuano: Oh Jehova, ikaw mao ang akong Dios; ituboy ko ikaw, pagadayegon ko ang imong ngalan; kay nakahimo ka ug mga butang nga katingalahan, ang imong mga pagtambag sa karaang panahon, sa pagkamatinumanon ug sa kamatuoran.
word.hebrew: א יהוה אלהי אתה--ארוממך אודה שמך כי עשית פלא  עצות מרחק אמונה אמן
word.hebrewmodern: יהוה אלהי אתה ארוממך אודה שמך כי עשית פלא עצות מרחוק אמונה אמן׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: κύριε ὁ θεός μου δοξάσω σε ὑμνήσω τὸ ὄνομά σου ὅτι ἐποίησας θαυμαστὰ πράγματα βουλὴν ἀρχαίαν ἀληθινήν γένοιτο κύριε

word.kjv: Thus saith the LORD, the Redeemer of Israel, and his Holy One, to him whom man despiseth, to him whom the nation abhorreth, to a servant of rulers, Kings shall see and arise, princes also shall worship, because of the LORD that is faithful, and the Holy One of Israel, and he shall choose thee.
word.thailand: พระเยโฮวาห์ ผู้ไถ่ของอิสราเอลและองค์บริสุทธิ์ ตรัสแก่ผู้ที่คนดูหมิ่นและแก่ผู้ที่ประชาชาติรังเกียจ ผู้เป็นผู้รับใช้ของผู้ครอบครองทั้งหลาย ดังนี้ว่า "กษัตริย์ทั้งหลายจะทอดพระเนตรและทรงลุกยืน บรรดาเจ้านายจะกราบลง เพราะเหตุพระเยโฮวาห์ผู้สัตย์ซื่อ องค์บริสุทธิ์ของอิสราเอล จะทรงเลือกสรรเจ้า"
word.spanish1909: Así ha dicho Jehová, Redentor de Israel, el Santo suyo, al menospreciado de alma, al abominado de las gentes, al siervo de los tiranos. Verán reyes, y levantaránse príncipes, y adorarán por Jehová; porque fiel es el Santo de Israel, el cual te escogió.
word.latinvulgate: Hæc dicit Dominus, redemptor Israël, Sanctus ejus, ad contemptibilem animam, ad abominatam gentem, ad servum dominorum : Reges videbunt, et consurgent principes, et adorabunt propter Dominum quia fidelis est, et Sanctum Israël qui elegit te.
word.italian1927: Così parla l’Eterno, il redentore, il Santo d’Israele, a colui ch’è disprezzato dagli uomini, detestato dalla nazione, schiavo de’ potenti: Dei re lo vedranno e si riveleranno; dei principi pure, e si prostreranno, a motivo dell’Eterno ch’è fedele, del Santo d’Israele che t’ha scelto.
word.german1912: So spricht der HERR, der Erlöser Israels, sein Heiliger, zu der verachteten Seele, zu dem Volk, das man verabscheut, zu dem Knecht, der unter den Tyrannen ist: Könige sollen sehen und aufstehen, und Fürsten sollen niederfallen um des HERRN willen, der treu ist, um des Heiligen in Israel willen, der dich erwählt hat.
word.french1910: Ainsi parle l'Eternel, le rédempteur, le Saint d'Israël, A celui qu'on méprise, qui est en horreur au peuple, A l'esclave des puissants: Des rois le verront, et ils se lèveront, Des princes, et ils se prosterneront, A cause de l'Eternel, qui est fidèle, Du Saint d'Israël, qui t'a choisi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 以色列的救贖主，以色列的聖者耶和華，對那被人藐視的、被本國憎惡的、被統治者奴役的，這樣說：“君王看見了，就必起立，領袖看見了，也要下拜，都因信實的耶和華，就是揀選了你的、以色列的聖者的緣故。”
word.korean: 이스라엘의 구속자, 이스라엘의 거룩한 자이신 여호와께서 사람에게 멸시를 당하는 자,백성에게 미움을 받는 자, 관원들에게 종이 된 자에게 이같이 이르시되 너를 보고 열왕이 일어서며 방백들이 경배하리니 이는 너를 택한 바 신실한 나 여호와 이스라엘의 거룩한 자를 인함이니라
word.tagalog: Ganito ang sabi ng Panginoon, ng Manunubos ng Israel, na kaniyang Banal, doon sa hinahamak ng tao, doon sa kinayayamutan ng bansa, sa lingkod ng mga pinuno, Ang mga hari at ang mga pangulo, ay mangakakakita at magsisibangon, at sila'y magsisisamba; dahil sa Panginoon na tapat, sa Banal ng Israel, na siyang pumili sa iyo.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te kupu tenei a Ihowa, a te kaihoko o Iharaira, a tona Mea Tapu hoki, ki ta te tangata e whakahawea nei, ki ta te iwi e whakarihariha nei, ki te pononga a nga ariki, Ka kite nga kingi, ka whakatika ano, ka koropiko hoki nga rangatira; he mea h oki na Ihowa, he pono hoki ia, na te Mea Tapu o Iharaira; nana hoki koe i whiriwhiri.
word.cebuano: Mao kini ang giingon ni Jehova, ang Manunubos sa Israel, ug ang iyang Balaan, kaniya nga ginatamay sa tawo, kaniya nga gikayugtan sa nasud, sa usa ka alagad sa mga magbubuot: Ang mga hari makakita ug manindog; mga principe, ug sila managsimba; tungod kang Jehova nga matinumanon, bisan pa ang Balaan sa Israel, nga maoy nagpili kanimo.
word.hebrew: ז כה אמר יהוה גאל ישראל קדושו לבזה נפש למתעב גוי לעבד משלים מלכים יראו וקמו שרים וישתחוו--למען יהוה אשר נאמן קדש ישראל ויבחרך  {ס}
word.hebrewmodern: כה אמר יהוה גאל ישראל קדושו לבזה נפש למתעב גוי לעבד משלים מלכים יראו וקמו שרים וישתחוו למען יהוה אשר נאמן קדש ישראל ויבחרך׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: οὕτως λέγει κύριος ὁ ῥυσάμενός σε ὁ θεὸς ισραηλ ἁγιάσατε τὸν φαυλίζοντα τὴν ψυχὴν αὐτοῦ τὸν βδελυσσόμενον ὑπὸ τῶν ἐθνῶν τῶν δούλων τῶν ἀρχόντων βασιλεῖς ὄψονται αὐτὸν καὶ ἀναστήσονται ἄρχοντες καὶ προσκυνήσουσιν αὐτῷ ἕνεκεν κυρίου ὅτι πιστός ἐστιν ὁ ἅγιος ισραηλ καὶ ἐξελεξάμην σε

word.kjv: The prophet that hath a dream, let him tell a dream; and he that hath my word, let him speak my word faithfully. What is the chaff to the wheat? saith the LORD.
word.thailand: จงให้ผู้พยากรณ์ที่ฝันเล่าความฝัน แต่ให้คนที่มีถ้อยคำของเรากล่าวถ้อยคำของเราอย่างสุจริต" พระเยโฮวาห์ตรัสว่า "ฟางข้าวมีอะไรบ้างที่เหมือนข้าวสาลี"
word.spanish1909: El profeta con quien fuere sueño, cuente sueño; y el con quien fuere mi palabra, cuente mi palabra verdadera. ¿Qué tiene que ver la paja con el trigo? dice Jehová.
word.latinvulgate: Propheta qui habet somnium, narret somnium : et qui habet sermonem meum, loquatur sermonem meum vere. Quid paleis ad triticum ? dicit Dominus.
word.italian1927: Il profeta che ha avuto un sogno, racconti il sogno, e colui che ha udito la mia parola riferisca la mia parola fedelmente. Che ha da fare la paglia col frumento? dice l’Eterno.
word.german1912: Ein Prophet, der Träume hat, der erzähle Träume; wer aber mein Wort hat, der Predige mein Wort recht. Wie reimen sich Stroh und Weizen zusammen? spricht der HERR.
word.french1910: Que le prophète qui a eu un songe raconte ce songe, Et que celui qui a entendu ma parole rapporte fidèlement ma parole. Pourquoi mêler la paille au froment? dit l'Eternel.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 作了夢的先知，讓他把夢述說出來；但得了我話語的先知，該忠實地傳講我的話。禾稈怎能和麥子相比呢？”這是耶和華的宣告。
word.korean: 나 여호와가 말하노라 몽사를 얻은 선지자는 몽사를 말할 것이요 내 말을 받은 자는 성실함으로 내 말을 말할 것이라 겨와 밀을 어찌 비교하겠느냐
word.tagalog: Ang propeta na nanaginip, ay magsaysay siya ng isang panaginip; at siyang nagtamo ng aking salita, salitain niya ang aking salita na may pagtatapat. Ano ang dayami sa trigo? sabi ng Panginoon.
word.maori: Ko te poropiti he moe nei tana, me korero e ia te moe; a ko te tangata i a ia taku kupu, kia pono tana korero i taku kupu. He aha oti ta te papapa ki te witi? e ai ta Ihowa.
word.cebuano: Ang manalagna nga adunay damgo, pasuginla siya ug usa ka damgo; ug kadtong nagabaton sa akong pulong pasultiha siya sa akong pulong sa pagkamatinumanon. Unsa ba ang dagami alang sa trigo? nagaingon si Jehova.
word.hebrew: כח הנביא אשר אתו חלום יספר חלום ואשר דברי אתו ידבר דברי אמת  מה לתבן את הבר נאם יהוה
word.hebrewmodern: הנביא אשר אתו חלום יספר חלום ואשר דברי אתו ידבר דברי אמת מה לתבן את הבר נאם יהוה׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: διὰ τοῦτο ἰδοὺ ἐγὼ πρὸς τοὺς προφήτας λέγει κύριος ὁ θεός τοὺς κλέπτοντας τοὺς λόγους μου ἕκαστος παρὰ τοῦ πλησίον αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Then they said to Jeremiah, The LORD be a true and faithful witness between us, if we do not even according to all things for the which the LORD thy God shall send thee to us.
word.thailand: แล้วเขาทั้งหลายพูดกับเยเรมีย์ว่า "ขอพระเยโฮวาห์จงเป็นพยานที่สัตย์จริงและสัตย์ซื่อในระหว่างข้าพเจ้าทั้งหลาย ถ้าข้าพเจ้าทั้งหลายมิได้กระทำตามบรรดาพระวจนะของพระเยโฮวาห์พระเจ้าของท่านผู้ทรงใช้ท่าน
word.spanish1909: Y ellos dijeron á Jeremías: Jehová sea entre nosotros testigo de la verdad y de la lealtad, si no hiciéremos conforme á todo aquello para lo cual Jehová tu Dios te enviare á nosotros.
word.latinvulgate: Et illi dixerunt ad Jeremiam : Sit Dominus inter nos testis veritatis et fidei, si non, juxta omne verbum in quo miserit te Dominus Deus tuus ad nos, sic faciemus :
word.italian1927: E quelli dissero a Geremia: "L’Eterno sia un testimonio verace e fedele contro di noi, se non facciamo tutto quello che l’Eterno, il tuo Dio, ti manderà a dirci.
word.german1912: Und sie sprachen zu Jeremia: Der HERR sei ein gewisser und wahrhaftiger Zeuge zwischen uns, wo wir nicht tun werden alles, was dir der HERR, dein Gott, an uns befehlen wird.
word.french1910: Et ils dirent à Jérémie: Que l'Eternel soit contre nous un témoin véritable et fidèle, si nous ne faisons pas tout ce que l'Eternel, ton Dieu, te chargera de nous dire!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 於是他們對耶利米說：“我們若不照著耶和華你的　神差遣你到我們這裡來所說的一切話去作，願耶和華作真實和誠信的見證，指控我們。
word.korean: 그들이 예레미야에게 이르되 우리가 당신의 하나님 여호와께서 당신을 보내사 우리에게 이르시는 모든 말씀대로 행하리이다 여호와는 우리 중에 진실 무망한 증인이 되시옵소서
word.tagalog: Nang magkagayo'y sinabi nila kay Jeremias, Ang Panginoon ay maging tunay at tapat na saksi sa gitna natin, kung hindi nga namin gawin ang ayon sa buong salita na ipasusugo sa iyo ng Panginoon mong Dios sa amin.
word.maori: Ano ra ko ratou ki a Heremaia, He pono, he tika hoki a Ihowa hei kaiwhakaatu mo ta tatou, ki te kahore e rite ta matou e mea ai ki nga kupu katoa e unga mai ai koe e Ihowa, e tou Atua, ki a matou.
word.cebuano: Unya sila ming-ingon kang Jeremias: Si Jehova maoy matuod ug matinumanong saksi sa taliwala nato, kong kami dili magbuhat sumala sa tanang mga pulong nga ipadala ni Jehova kanimo alang kanamo.
word.hebrew: ה והמה אמרו אל ירמיהו יהי יהוה בנו לעד אמת ונאמן  אם לא ככל הדבר אשר ישלחך יהוה אלהיך אלינו--כן נעשה
word.hebrewmodern: והמה אמרו אל ירמיהו יהי יהוה בנו לעד אמת ונאמן אם לא ככל הדבר אשר ישלחך יהוה אלהיך אלינו כן נעשה׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ ἔδωκα κατὰ πρόσωπον αὐτῶν κεράμιον οἴνου καὶ ποτήρια καὶ εἶπα πίετε οἶνον

word.kjv: They are new every morning: great is thy faithfulness.
word.thailand: เป็นของใหม่อยู่ทุกเวลาเช้า ความสัตย์ซื่อของพระองค์ใหญ่ยิ่งนัก
word.spanish1909: Nuevas son cada mañana; grande es tu fidelidad.
word.latinvulgate: HETH. Novi diluculo, multa est fides tua.
word.italian1927: si rinnovano ogni mattina. Grande è la tua fedeltà!
word.german1912: sondern sie ist alle Morgen neu, und deine Treue ist groß.
word.french1910: Elles se renouvellent chaque matin. Oh! que ta fidélité est grande!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 每天早晨都是新的；你的信實多麼廣大！
word.korean: 이것이 아침마다 새로우니 주의 성실이 크도소이다
word.tagalog: Ang mga yao'y bago tuwing umaga, dakila ang inyong pagtatapat.
word.maori: E hou tonu ana ratou i tenei ata, i tenei ata; he nui tou pono.
word.cebuano: Sila ginabag-o sa matag-buntag; daku ang imong pagkamatinumanon.
word.hebrewmodern: חדשים לבקרים רבה אמונתך׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ ὑπομενεῖ καὶ ἡσυχάσει εἰς τὸ σωτήριον κυρίου

word.kjv: Then the presidents and princes sought to find occasion against Daniel concerning the kingdom; but they could find none occasion nor fault; forasmuch as he was faithful, neither was there any error or fault found in him.
word.thailand: อภิรัฐมนตรีและอุปราชทั้งหลายจึงหามูลเหตุฟ้องดาเนียลในเรื่องเกี่ยวกับราชอาณาจักร แต่ก็หามูลเหตุหรือความผิดไม่ได้ เพราะท่านเป็นคนสัตย์ซื่อ จะหาความพลั้งพลาดหรือความผิดในท่านมิได้เลย
word.spanish1909: Entonces los presidentes y gobernadores buscaban ocasiones contra Daniel por parte del reino; mas no podían hallar alguna ocasión ó falta, porque él era fiel, y ningún vicio ni falta fué en él hallado.
word.latinvulgate: Porro rex cogitabat constituere eum super omne regnum : unde principes, et satrapæ quærebant occasionem ut invenirent Danieli ex latere regis : nullamque causam, et suspicionem reperire potuerunt, eo quod fidelis esset, et omnis culpa, et suspicio non inveniretur in eo.
word.italian1927: Allora i capi e i satrapi cercarono di trovare un’occasione d’accusar Daniele circa l’amministrazione del regno; ma non potevano trovare alcuna occasione, né alcun motivo di riprensione, perch’egli era fedele, e non c’era da trovare il lui alcunché di male o da riprendere.
word.german1912: Derhalben trachteten die Fürsten und Landvögte darnach, wie sie eine Sache an Daniel fänden, die wider das Königreich wäre. Aber sie konnten keine Sache noch Übeltat finden; denn er war treu, daß man ihm keine Schuld noch Übeltat an ihm finden mochte.
word.french1910: Alors les chefs et les satrapes cherchèrent une occasion d'accuser Daniel en ce qui concernait les affaires du royaume. Mais ils ne purent trouver aucune occasion, ni aucune chose à reprendre, parce qu'il était fidèle, et qu'on n'apercevait chez lui ni faute, ni rien de mauvais.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 引起同僚的嫉妒與謀害於是這些監察司和總督在但以理治國的事上，尋找把柄控告他，只是不能找到任何的把柄和過失，因為他忠心可靠，他們找不到他的任何錯誤和過失。
word.korean: 이에 총리들과 방백들이 국사에 대하여 다니엘을 고소할 틈을 얻고자 하였으나 능히 아무 틈, 아무 허물을 얻지 못하였으니 이는 그가 충성되어 아무 그릇함도 없고 아무 허물도 없음이었더라
word.tagalog: Nang magkagayo'y ang mga pangulo at ang mga satrapa ay nagsihanap ng maisusumbong laban kay Daniel, tungkol sa kaharian; nguni't hindi sila nangakasumpong ng anomang kadahilanan, ni kakulangan man, palibhasa'y tapat siya, walang anomang kamalian ni kakulangan nasumpungan sa kaniya.
word.maori: Katahi nga rangatira nunui ratou ko nga ariki ka rapu take mo Raniera i roto i nga mea o te kingitanga; heoi kihai i kitea tetahi take, tetahi he; he mahi pono hoki tana, kahore ona kino, ona he.
word.cebuano: Nan ang mga presidente ug ang mga principe nanagpangita sa higayon batok kang Daniel mahatungod sa gingharian; apan sila wala makakita sa higayon ni kalapasan, sanglit siya matinumanon man, ni may hikaplagan sila nga sayup kun kalapasan diha kaniya.
word.hebrew: ד אדין דניאל דנה הוא מתנצח על סרכיא ואחשדרפניא  כל קבל די רוח יתירא בה ומלכא עשית להקמותה על כל מלכותא
word.hebrewmodern: אדין סרכיא ואחשדרפניא הוו בעין עלה להשכחה לדניאל מצד מלכותא וכל עלה ושחיתה לא יכלין להשכחה כל קבל די מהימן הוא וכל שלו ושחיתה לא השתכחת עלוהי׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ὑπὲρ πάντας ἔχων ἐξουσίαν ἐν τῇ βασιλείᾳ καὶ δανιηλ ἦν ἐνδεδυμένος πορφύραν καὶ μέγας καὶ ἔνδοξος ἔναντι δαρείου τοῦ βασιλέως καθότι ἦν ἔνδοξος καὶ ἐπιστήμων καὶ συνετός καὶ πνεῦμα ἅγιον ἐν αὐτῷ καὶ εὐοδούμενος ἐν ταῖς πραγματείαις τοῦ βασιλέως αἷς ἔπρασσε τότε ὁ βασιλεὺς ἐβουλεύσατο καταστῆσαι τὸν δανιηλ ἐπὶ πάσης τῆς βασιλείας αὐτοῦ καὶ τοὺς δύο ἄνδρας οὓς κατέστησε μετ' αὐτοῦ καὶ σατράπας ἑκατὸν εἴκοσι ἑπτά

word.kjv: I will even betroth thee unto me in faithfulness: and thou shalt know the LORD.

word.kjv: Ephraim compasseth me about with lies, and the house of Israel with deceit: but Judah yet ruleth with God, and is faithful with the saints.

word.maori: Kua oti ahau te karapoti e Eparaima ki te teka, e te whare o Iharaira ki te tinihanga: engari a Hura kei runga i ta te Atua tana tikanga: kei te Mea Tapu ia, pono tonu.

word.korean: 보라, 그의 마음은 교만하며 그의 속에서 정직하지 못하니라 그러나 의인은 그 믿음으로 말미암아 살리라 !

word.kjv: Wherefore, if God so clothe the grass of the field, which to day is, and to morrow is cast into the oven, shall he not much more clothe you, O ye of little faith?

word.german1912: So denn Gott das Gras auf dem Felde also kleidet, das doch heute steht und morgen in den Ofen geworfen wird: sollte er das nicht viel mehr euch tun, o ihr Kleingläubigen?

word.cebuano: Ug siya miingon kanila: Nganong nangahadlok kamo, Oh kamo nga diyutay ing pagloo? Unya mibangon siya ug gibadlong niya ang mga hangin ug ang dagat, ug miabut ang usa ka dakung kalinaw.

word.german1912: Und siehe, da brachten sie zu ihm einen Gichtbrüchigen, der lag auf einem Bett. Da nun Jesus ihren Glauben sah, sprach er zu dem Gichtbrüchigen: Sei getrost, mein Sohn; deine Sünden sind dir vergeben.
word.french1910: Et voici, on lui amena un paralytique couché sur un lit. Jésus, voyant leur foi, dit au paralytique: Prends courage, mon enfant, tes péchés te sont pardonnés.

word.maori: Na ka kawea mai e ratou ki a ia tetahi pararutiki, e takoto ana i runga i te moenga; no te kitenga o Ihu i to ratou whakapono ka mea ia ki te pararutiki, E tama, kia maia; ka oti ou hara te muru.
word.cebuano: Ug ania karon, ilang gidala kaniya ang usa nga giparalisis nga nagahigda sa usa ka duyan. Ug sa nakita ni Jesus ang ilang pagtoo, miingon sa giparalisis: Anak, magmalipayon ka, gipasaylo kanimo ang imong mga sala.
word.hebrewmodern: והנה הם מביאים אליו איש נכה אברים והוא משכב על המטה ויהי כראות ישוע את אמונתם ויאמר אל נכה האברים חזק בני נסלחו לך חטאתיך׃
word.textusreceptus: και ιδου προσεφερον αυτω παραλυτικον επι κλινης βεβλημενον και ιδων ο ιησους την πιστιν αυτων ειπεν τω παραλυτικω θαρσει τεκνον αφεωνται σοι αι αμαρτιαι σου

word.kjv: But Jesus turned him about, and when he saw her, he said, Daughter, be of good comfort; thy faith hath made thee whole. And the woman was made whole from that hour.
word.thailand: ฝ่ายพระเยซูทรงเหลียวหลังทอดพระเนตรเห็นนางจึงตรัสว่า "ลูกสาวเอ๋ย จงชื่นใจเถิด ความเชื่อของเจ้าทำให้เจ้าหายเป็นปกติ" นับตั้งแต่เวลานั้น ผู้หญิงนั้นก็หายป่วยเป็นปกติ
word.spanish1909: Mas Jesús volviéndose, y mirándola, dijo: Confía, hija, tu fe te ha salvado. Y la mujer fué salva desde aquella hora.
